parameters: \}(Now there are six of them. I can’t take them all on.)
\msgposy[220]Hmph, not even a Turk can take on six of us at once.
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>Hey, rookie! Looks like you’ve gotten yourself into
quite a mess on your first day, huh?
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>They just don't know when to give up, eh?
This isn't good. We still have to take care of the
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>Well then, looks like it's your time to shine, rookie.
You head inside. I’ll take care of these guys.
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>And don't worry about it. I'll catch up with you
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>Well, fellas. It looks like I can't stick around
\n<???>But that's to be expected of the fastest member of
\msgposy[220]\n<Tseng>You sure seem to know a lot about me, don't you?
\n<???>Knowing one's enemy is a basic battle strategy.
\n<???>Unfortunately, that speed of yours is no match for me.
\msgposy[220]\n<Reno>We won't know for sure until we test it now, will we?
\n<???>Very well, then. Show me the true strength
